text: Yaakōbu ga rinjū no toki, anata gata wa tachiatta ka. Kare ga sono shison ni mukatte,`watashi ga nakiato, anata gata wa nani ni tsukaeru no ka.' To iu to, kare-ra wa,`watashi-tachi wa anata no kami, iburāhīmu, isumāīru, isuhāku no kami, yuiitsu no kami (arrā) ni tsukaemasu. Kare ni, watashi-tachi wa fukujū, kie shimasu.' To itta
